articles.author: 闫星周
articles.title: 900m+ devices now run on HarmonyOS - Chinadaily.com.cn - China Daily
articles.description: Huawei Technologies Co said on Friday that more than 900 million devices in China, including its own-branded products as well as devices from third-party companies, now run on its self-developed operating system HarmonyOS.
articles.content:
A booth promotes Huawei's HarmonyOS during an expo in Shanghai. CHEN YUYU/FOR CHINA DAILY

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: S&P, Nasdaq end lower as Nvidia drags the tech sector for second day - Reuters

articles.author: Kali Hays
articles.title: OpenAI, Anthropic Ignore Rule That Prevents Bots Scraping Web Content - Business Insider
articles.description: OpenAI and Anthropic have said publicly they respect robots.txt. But they are among the biggest tech companies ignoring the rule, BI has learned.

articles.author: Lu Wang, Isabelle Lee
articles.title: Tech Funds' Record Cash Injection Is Traced to 'Messy' Rebalance - Bloomberg
articles.description: On the surface, technology-focused stock funds just enjoyed a week of record inflows, the latest sign of the AI craze. A look under the hood, however, showed almost all the money went into a single fund — and it had little to do with the industry’s fundamenta…
